Before hitting the ground Thirst broke free and sent a kick at  Voids 
face (like heck one of your chars is taking one of mine down but I 
already said he was going unconcious so could we just forget these 
last 2 posts and say Hugar's chars finished him).

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> OOC: Dewboy, the cloud encompasses the area all around thirst and 
where 
> thirst isnt is Hugars charachters. heh theres no escape. You did 
soemthing 
> dumb. Introduce a hostile charachter on someone elses ship and tried 
doing 
> stuff to it without their permission. Thirst has no escape. He is 
blocked 
> from all escape, the end is inevitable.
> 
> IC: As Thirst lepped out of the cloud the acid was still on him, 
that is what 
> the cloud was made of. A second before thirst reached rights neck, 
void 
> lunged forward and slammed a claw into Thirsts back and then 
gdragged him 
> back before slamming him into the ground.
